articles.author: Keith Cowing
articles.title: Ladakh’s Rock Varnish May Help Identify Habitable Environments In Space - Astrobiology News
articles.description: Magnetofossils-- fossil remains of magnetic particles produced by magnetotactic bacteria have been spotted in rock varnish layers in Ladakh.
articles.content: (a) FE-SEM image of the varnish layer showing the presence of magnetotactic multicellular aggregate (MMA) type entity embedded in the varnish layer marked by yellow arrows ; inset a1 shows magnified … [+4770 chars]

articles.author: Sascha Pare
articles.title: Discovery of 'dark oxygen' from deep-sea metal lumps could trigger rethink of origins of life - Space.com
articles.description: In a global first, scientists working in the Clarion-Clipperton Zone in the North Pacific Ocean have found that metallic nodules on the seafloor produce their own oxygen, dubbed "dark oxygen."
articles.content:
Potato-size metallic nodules strewn across the Pacific Ocean seafloor produce oxygen in complete darkness and without any help from living organisms, new research reveals.
The discovery of this deep… [+4119 chars]
